dk.aau.cs.d402f13.simulator

Class BoardWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • dk.aau.cs.d402f13.widgets.Widget
      • dk.aau.cs.d402f13.simulator.BoardWidget
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GridBoardWidget

    public abstract class BoardWidget
extends Widget
    SimulatedBoard represents and visualizes the game board and its pieces. It makes it possible move pieces by either D&D, or clicking on two squares in succession.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class dk.aau.cs.d402f13.widgets.Widget

      void acceptEvent(Widget obj, Widget.Event event) 
      protected abstract void alignDrag()
      When starting a drag, align the cursor to the center of the piece, in order to make it drop on the Square which is centered below the piece, and not at the position at cursor is at.

      • alignDrag

        protected abstract void alignDrag()
        When starting a drag, align the cursor to the center of the piece, in order to make it drop on the Square which is centered below the piece, and not at the position at cursor is at.
